performance_metrics.name: Batch Size (Weight)
performance_metrics.description: The total weight of dough produced per batch. Scalability requires adjustments to mixer size and dough hydration.

performance_metrics.name: Cycle Time (Batch)
performance_metrics.description: The time from dough mixing initiation to dough deposition onto conveyor belt. Minimizing this time is critical for throughput.

performance_metrics.name: Yield (Weight)
performance_metrics.description: The percentage of initial flour weight retained in the final bread product. Factors impacting this include gluten development and handling losses.

performance_metrics.name: Bread Weight (Finished)
performance_metrics.description: Target weight of a standard loaf (sandwich or boule). Consistent loaf size is a key performance indicator.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Volume (cm³)
performance_metrics.description: A measure of bread texture, influenced by yeast activity, dough fermentation, and oven conditions. Measured via a crumb analyzer.

performance_metrics.name: Specific Volume (cm³/g)
performance_metrics.description: Relationship between crumb volume and bread weight, an indicator of bread quality and porosity.

performance_metrics.name: Moisture Content (%)
performance_metrics.description: Measured using a moisture analyzer. Critical for shelf life and texture maintenance.

performance_metrics.name: Gluten Strength (kPa)
performance_metrics.description: Measured using a farinograph. Indicates dough's resistance to extension, influencing bread volume and structure.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Mixer
implementation_requirements.specifications: Spiral mixer, 300 - 500 liters capacity, stainless steel construction, variable speed control (100 - 600 RPM), integrated dough temperature sensor.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures homogenous dough mixing, temperature control is crucial for yeast activity.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Depositor
implementation_requirements.specifications: Conveyor system with adjustable drop height (50 - 100 mm), calibrated paddles, integrated weight scales (± 10g accuracy).
implementation_requirements.description: Accurate dough deposition is necessary for consistent loaf size and weight.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofing Cabinet
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature: 32 - 38°C, Humidity: 70 - 80%, Capacity: 150 - 200 liters, Controlled environment with temperature and humidity sensors and alarms.
implementation_requirements.description: Regulates dough temperature and humidity for optimal yeast activity during the first rise.

implementation_requirements.name: Shaping Station
implementation_requirements.specifications: Automated shaping equipment with robotic arms, capable of producing various loaf shapes (sandwiches, boules).
implementation_requirements.description: Automates the shaping process to ensure consistency and reduce manual labor.

implementation_requirements.name: Oven
implementation_requirements.specifications: Deck oven or rotary rack oven with independent temperature zones (250 - 300°C), precise temperature control, steam injection system (100-200 g/hr), conveyor belt system.
implementation_requirements.description: Provides uniform heat distribution and moisture control for optimal bread baking.

implementation_requirements.name: Cooling Tunnel
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature: 15 - 20°C, Humidity: 60 - 70%, Conveyor system for rapid cooling of baked bread.
implementation_requirements.description: Prevents bread from becoming soggy during the cooling process.

industry_standards: HACCP (Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points)
operational_considerations: Ingredient Sourcing & Quality Control (Flour, Yeast, Water, Salt)
